Name: Wireshark
Description: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer that enables you to capture and interactively browse the traffic running on a computer network.
HTU: Download and install Wireshark, start a network capture, and analyze the captured network data.

Name: tcpdump
Description: tcpdump is a powerful command-line packet analyzer that captures and displays packet data from network interfaces.
HTU: Install tcpdump, run `tcpdump` with appropriate options to capture packets, and analyze the output.

Name: tshark
Description: Tshark is the command-line version of Wireshark, used for capturing and analyzing network packets.
HTU: Install Tshark, run `tshark` to capture and analyze packets from network interfaces.

Name: Ettercap
Description: Ettercap is a comprehensive suite for man-in-the-middle attacks on LAN. It features sniffing of live connections and content filtering.
HTU: Install Ettercap, configure target interfaces, start sniffing, and perform MITM attacks if needed.

Name: Kismet
Description: Kismet is a network detector, packet sniffer, and intrusion detection system for 802.11 wireless LANs.
HTU: Install Kismet, configure wireless interfaces, start capturing wireless packets, and analyze the traffic.
